definitions.definition: Synonym of crossguard ( “ a metal bar fixed between, and at right angles to , the blade and the handle of a sword or other bladed weapon that stops an opponent 's similar weapon from sliding along the blade and injuring the hand of the person wielding the sword ” ) .
Either of the two arms of a crossguard.

main_definition: Synonym of crossguard ( “ a metal bar fixed between, and at right angles to , the blade and the handle of a sword or other bladed weapon that stops an opponent 's similar weapon from sliding along the blade and injuring the hand of the person wielding the sword ” ) .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly in the plural ) Either of the two arms of a crossguard.
